name: skvrnami
body:
### Under construction.

### Some visualizations
**Same system, new faces?**
What happened with the candidates of (minor) political parties? Did they stop running when a minor failed to get a mandate/stop its activities?
Here is some evidence from the Czech Republic. 
[Switches of candidates between parties (CZ, 2010-13, all parties)](http://skvrnami.github.io/sankey-graphs/cz1013all-wpo.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
